## StateTypeReturnType type

Maps a \[\[StateType\]\] to the type of its public API for usage in plugin
components

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type StateTypeReturnType<
  D extends StateType
> = D extends StateType<any, any, infer R> ? R : never
```

<b>References:</b> [StateType](./internal__plugin-state.statetype.md)
